text: [Music]
the proud rose once in a desert where no
life could survive a miracle took place
out bloomed a beautiful mesmerizing rose
it was a tiny bud that bloomed into a
tiny flower though it was yet to have
all its petals it was the most beautiful
thing anybody had ever seen just beside
the Rose there grew two cactuses their
names were Ted and moss Ted was a short
cactus and Moss was a tall one they had
their own unique shapes and were very
happy to have a rose between them isn't
it magical to have a rose bloom between
us
it sure is Ted it truly is
wait why don't we name her magic how
that's a wonderful name magic and thus
the beautiful rose was named magic magic
was not a normal rose and the two
cactuses knew it well she was growing
too slow for any normal flower and for
the joy of Ted and Moss it seemed like
she was there to stay for a very long
time as a child
magic was the most mischievous one she
would pinch Moss and put the blame on
Ted will you cut that now Ted this trick
is Old roof-tree are you talking about
me drinking the water stored inside of
myself that's not a trick ball that's
how I survive keep drinking the water
inside of yourself that's all yuck
that's disgusting
do what you won't just stop telling me
and stop pinching me Vinson you great
goodness did you fall asleep with your
eyes open again
don't you dare play that card yeah it
happened once and I was tired Yeah right
tired of what genius Oh Stanley in the
middle of the desert why don't you take
a little walk then your roots your rules
oh just stop pinching me all right I'm
not pinching you stop dreaming with your
eyes open
the cactuses would argue for hours over
it
nobody would ever accuse the tiny
innocent Rose both Ted and mas being
cactuses had ample water stored in them
they would each give some water to magic
and help her stay healthy they both
loved magic dearly and never told her
that if she didn't drink enough water
she would die months passed and magic
grew up she bloomed to be the most
beautiful flower upon earth
she had layers and layers of petals and
was bright red in color surprisingly she
grew taller than Ted but was still
shorter than Moss both the cactuses were
very proud of their magic her roots
spread under the sand and held her
posture strong on the surface
mas would give her a shower whenever she
asked for tea and Ted would big
heartedly open his brunch and lets her
drink father when she got thirsty
nothing changed
she loved both her friends months passed
and the desert finally had a visitor he
was a tourist on a camel what a rose in
the desert this is the most magical and
beautiful thing I have ever seen
[Music]
the tourists went closer and examined
the flower he then took out a bowl of
water and kept it in front of magic
you must be so thirsty you little flower
wait let me find my little spray it's
time to give you a bath but magic wasn't
listening
she was mesmerised at what she saw in
the bowl of water it was her reflection
I am the most beautiful flower indeed
look at that straight posture oh the
bright red colour the thick petals I'd
look amazing
all this while I thought I look like
Teddy and mouse I thought I needed them
but no they need me I make them look
attractive the tourists found his spray
dipped it in the bowl of water and spray
droplets on magic the droplets made
magic look even more magical oh my oh my
look at me hmm this flower is beautiful
Oh Thank You stranger I'm sure I will be
paid a handsome reward if I am route
this flower and take it with me you
would love to see the city wouldn't you
the city of course I would love to see
the city
Oh what is this wound on your stem ah it
must be these cactuses you deserve to be
put in a garden securely for everyone to
come see you the tourists didn't know
that the wound came from the fact that
magic had to bend to drink water from
Ted he also didn't know that she would
possibly not survive if uprooted and
taken from where she belongs
wait let me uproot you but both the
cactuses knew it they knew that the city
was far far away magic was a magical
flower indeed and yet she was just a
rose she couldn't possibly survive the
long journey through this rough desert
they knew that once uprooted magic would
not live for long without thinking twice
they bruised the tourist as he came
closer to uproot the rose aha how dare
you you stupid cactuses in rage and pain
the tourists can't cross but being a
cactus absolutely no harm was done to
him instead the tourist was bruised some
more because of the thorns aha who's
stupid now human dude won't mossy the
tourists couldn't hear the cactuses
laugh at him but he assumed that they
must be this made him more furious and
he kicked Ted but yet again he needs to
stop the tourists
sadly sat on his cab
and less Ted and Maus both laughed
heartily but magic didn't how dare you
both why are you so jealous of me
jealous
magic you don't understand he was taking
you only for his own benefit he wouldn't
have cared for you who are you to decide
what's right for me you too are ugly
cactuses I am the most beautiful flower
on this planet didn't you hear
I should be securely kept in a garden
for people to come see me magic don't be
so proud of yourself why not what's so
special about you two we can hold water
for years how do you think you are
surviving but magic wasn't listening she
kept complaining and insulting the two
cactuses she vowed that she would never
bend to drink water from tent she didn't
want to hurt her beautiful neck
really you will never drink water fan
Ted we have done enough for her she
should fend for herself man both the
cactuses hardened themselves and stops
talking to magic they were very angry at
her for how arrogant she suddenly
behaved magic was very happy for the
first few days the water in her roots
was being used to keep her fresh she
didn't look at either of the cactuses
and always kept herself arched up
but a week later she began to feel weak
she still tried to stand straight for
she didn't want to show her weakness to
the cactuses but as all the water and
her roofs was being used up her insides
were giving away and she began to pent
Maya chick lose your pride and drink
some water
yes magic you will still be the most
beautiful flower after drinking some
water no I will not band one more day
passed and magic was now completely bent
she was dizzy and weak she began to cry
[Music]
why is this happening to me because you
need water to survive you proud flower
please boy does help you you still want
to help me
I didn't want to band but nature made me
I have realized my mistake I have been
terrible to both of you I deserve this
uh-oh sorry without wasting a minute
both Ted and mas showered water on magic
it took some time but magic was finally
standing on her roots again oh I am so
sorry
will you both ever forgive me yeah you
are already forgiven our little magic
the three plants were happy again
magic had realized her mistake pride is
a very expensive emotion if we are too
proud of ourselves we must be ready to
pay a very heavy price for it
[Music]
